SELECT T.CO_CD, T.FILE_KEY, T.FILE_SIZE, T.FILE_TYPE, T.FILE_NAME, T.FILE_PATH, T.FILE_TRGT_TYP, T.FILE_TRGT_KEY, T.USE_YN, T.CREAT_ID, T.CREAT_PGM, TO_CHAR(T.CREAT_DTTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREAT_DTTM, T.CLNT_CD, A.CLNT_NM, T.PRDT_CD, (SELECT PRDT_NM FROM TB_BM01M01 WHERE PRDT_CD = T.PRDT_CD) PRDT_NM, T.ITEM_CD, FN_CM05M01_CD_TO_NM(ITEM_CD) AS ITEM_NM, T.SALES_CD, T.PRJCT_CD, (SELECT PRJCT_NM FROM TB_BM06M01 WHERE PRJCT_SEQ = T.PRJCT_CD) PRJCT_NM FROM TB_CM08M01 T left outer join TB_BM02M01 A on T.CLNT_CD = A.CLNT_CD WHERE T.COMON_CD = #{comonCd} AND T.FILE_TRGT_KEY= #{fileTrgtKey}
AND T.CREAT_DTTM BETWEEN to_date(REPLACE(#{reqDtFrom},'-','')) AND to_date(REPLACE(#{reqDtTo},'-',''))+1
